name: UK Post Code
description:
Matches valid UK Post Codes as of 18/11/2014 with no false positives.
Excludes illegal characters.
Case insensitive.
Space optional.
content:
Valid:

M1 1AA
m60 1NW
CR2 6XH
DN55 1PT
W1A 1HQ
EC1A 1BB
CW3 9SS
SE5 0EG
se5 0eg
WC2H7LT

Invalid:

aWC2H 7LT
WC2H 7LTa
WC2H
author: James Byers
